item.title: [Pi] Making Npcs Teleport away during combat
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Is there a way to make an npc teleport during combat?

Example, Say i was fighting an npc at X: 1111 Y: 2222, and during the fight i wanted the monster to teleport to X: 1115 Y: 2230.

Any idea how i could do this, Is there already a void in Pi that does this?

I was thinking someothing like.

public void moveNPC { npcs[i].teleToX = 1111 + Misc.random(6); npcs[i].teleToY = 2222 - Misc.random(7); }

then in the loadspell putting this?

idk thats my idea though.

Read full topic
item.source: [Pi] Making Npcs Teleport away during combat
